1:
--------------------
Text: The New York Rock and Soul Revue:  The project was led by Donald Fagen (soloist and co-founder of Steely Dan) and included Phoebe Snow, Michael McDonald, Boz Scaggs, Eddie Brigati (formerly of The Rascals), David Brigati (also of The Rascals), the late Charles Brown, and Walter Becker (soloist and co-founder of Steely Dan).
Triplets:<Donald Fagen
2: The New York Rock and Soul Revue
The New York Rock and Soul Revue

--------------------
Text: The New York Rock and Soul Revue:  The project also featured Jeff Young and the Youngsters, the late saxophonist Cornelius Bumpus (who had formerly worked with Steely Dan, the Doobie Brothers and Boz Scaggs), and the late violinist Mindy Jostyn.
